messages.text: Apny jo issy Pehle report bheji thi working ki wo wapis bhejdyn data check krna hy just re forward krdyn

UMAMA 12th SEPTEMBER WORKING MSG:

Sir asharib k sath cloing agent or uski frontend dashboard deployment pr work kiya hai sir almost complete hi hai bss Thora sa error agya tha end time pr usmy to wo me Kal asharib k sath fix krdungi after deployment frontend se connect kr k globally testing k liye available hojayega Baki Jo master agent ka work hai wo asharib ne kiya hai ...

Sir shahzaib bhai se IT Indus ki wokring divide krli hai and according to IT Indus website ki  services usmy meny consent set kiya hai hope k user attract hokr usy click kry and humy opt-in Mily ...

 Signup Modal →
Title: “Sign up to access free IT resources & tools (demo) ”

Free CRM templates

API automation cheatsheet

Free AI bot demo

Newsletter subscription

Referral Option →

“Invite your colleagues → get early access to premium tools(demo)  / free consultancy hour.”

Umamma ! AI Anaysis ky Mutabiq.IT INDUS Website mei Each/Every Fault Kahtam & DONU WEBSITES/Apps KE CHAT GPT ANALYSIS REPORT SEND KRAIN.

Pahly Haafiz ky saath Dash Board, Master Agent & Colone Agents Final/Live Krdain.

&

TOTAL 14 WEBSITES & Social Media ky Local/Overseas  Pages mei Aapny ya Amman ky Proposal ky Mutabiq Optin Set krain.Danyal ke Daily SEO Working sy Websites Social Media Pages per bhi koi optin nahi aa raha hy,check krky urgent errors fix kro & at least Daily 1 Company ke Website & Company/ PROJECTS ky different Social Media Pages ky Logos/Contact us BUTTONS & OFFICE PTCL,Mobile,Whatsapp,Email Logos per Client ky Click per automatic OPTIN/CONSENT Lain.

IT INDUS & IT Multiverse mei each & every cateogry ky Portofolios ke uploading final kro & wrongly implemented opt-in functionality in all sites ke Proper Mapping krain.

&

Summaya sy bhi
IT Multiverse ke 04 Checklists ky mutabiq each cateogry ky Portofolios Lo.Sirf UI/UX NAHI.Summaya ny IT MULTIVERSE ky Sab Portfolios ready kry hai.Summaya ky PORTFOLIOS ke List send kro.

Danyal sy Daily 1 Website & Local/Overseas Pages ke Daily Working Report Lo.Danyal ke Report ky mutabiq Daily websites & Soicial Media pages per Visitors/Followers check krain.2 Month mei 20 Campaigns bhi Run ke hai,Aab Website ky Landing pages sy campaigns Run ho rahe hai & Daily Social Media pages per activity sy traffic bhi hy ya nahi & Report ky Mutabiq Clients sy Optin ke Report send kro.

&

IT MULTIVERSE & IT INDUS WEBSITES mei Zoho Services ky Sepeate pages & Zoho Services ky New Pages with Each/Every Service ky Seprate content/Pics & Videos PLUS Sales & Hiring Posts Read krky Sab Services ky Seprate pages with content/Pics & Videos Working ka Sumayya st UI/UX Work Final Krwao.

IT MULTIVERSE & IT INDUS WEBSITES mei 4 pdf Files ke total 40 IT SERVICES &
1. Ai Automation 
2. API Integration.
3. AI Agents  & Tools Integration.
5. Deep Learning Solution

ky Seprate pages with Each/Every Service ky pages content/Pics & Videos ka bhi Summaya sy UI/UX waghera Work Final krwao.

UMAMA 13th August Working Msg:

Sir AI analysis k mutabiq IT Indus k faults me fix krdungi or Uski reports apko send krdungi because me asharib k sath agent pr work kr rhi thi perfect work kr rha tha backend Frontend dashboard se connect krdi thi wo done hogya tha testing k liye dedety but usmy Thora error agya tha but deploy krdiya hai wo Kal complete hojayega or live bhi krdungi InshaAllah ..

Zoho k pages services meny shahzaib k Sath divide kr k add krdi thi IT Indus me portfolio bhi add krdiya tha CONSENT bhi laga diya tha IT multiverse me shahzaib bhai ne khud kiya kaam or Jo errors thy wo fix krdiya thy bss report bnani reh gyi hai wo me apko Kal bnakr send krdungi

Umamma ! Aapni Choice sy Reply nahi Mery Msg ky Murabiq each working ka point by point reply krain & Pahly Haafiz/Amman ky saath Dash Board, Final/Project ko Live Krain.

Aaj sy Shazaib ky saath ROLLING STONES UK WEBSITE ke Over Share/AI Agent ke Working Start & AI Anaysis ky Mutabiq.IT INDUS Website mei Each/Every Fault Kahtam & DONU WEBSITES/Apps KE CHAT GPT ANALYSIS REPORT SEND KRAIN.

&

Remaining 12 WEBSITES & Each Company/Project ky different Social Media Pages ke Working Sab staff ky saath Divide & Aap Daily 1 Website & Company/Project ky Total Social Media Pages sy Optin ke Working Final/update msg krain.wrongly implemented opt-in ke Proper Mapping krain.Logos/Contact us BUTTONS & OFFICE PTCL,Mobile,Whatsapp,Email Logos per Client ky Click per automatic OPTIN/CONSENT Lain.

Danyal sy Daily 1 Website & Local/Overseas Pages ke Daily Working Report Lain.Danyal ke Report ky mutabiq Daily websites & Soicial Media pages per Visitors/Followers check krain.2 Month mei 20 Campaigns bhi Run ke hai,Aab Website ky Landing pages sy campaigns Run ho rahe hai & Daily Social Media pages per activity sy traffic bhi hy ya nahi & Report ky Mutabiq Clients sy Daily Optin ke Report send krain.

&

July mei Aap & Summaya ko IT MULTIVERSE WEBSITES mei 4 pdf Files ke total 40 IT SERVICES 
ky Seprate pages with Each/Every Service ky PORTFOLIOS Ready krny thy & Aap ny Working done ke Report bhi msg ke hai,Pahly as per Check List donu Websites ky previous Portfolios ke complete list send krain.

IT MULTIVERSE & IT INDUS WEBSITES mei Zoho Services ky Sepeate pages & Zoho Services ky New Pages with Each/Every Service ky Seprate content/Pics & Videos PLUS Sales & Hiring Posts ke Sab Services ky Seprate pages with content/Pics & Videos ke List bhi send krain.

&

Summaya sy IT MULTIVERSE WEBSITES mei 4 pdf Files ke total 40 IT SERVICES 
ky Seprate pages/PORTFOLIOS & IT MULTIVERSE/IT INDUS WEBSITES mei Zoho Services ky Sepeate pages & Zoho Services ky New Pages with Each/Every Service ky Seprate content/Pics & Videos PLUS Sales & Hiring Posts ke Sab Services ky Seprate pages with content/Pics & Videos ka UI/UX WORKING FINAL krky confirm krain.

2. API Integration.
3. AI Agents  & Tools Integration.
5. Deep Learning Solution
6. SALES & MARKETING POSTS KE ALL NEW IT SERVICES
